name: df-sconn
body: |- wceq(csconn, crab(s0, cpconn, wral(s1, co(cii, ccn, cv(s0)), wi(wceq(cfv(cv(s1), nat0), cfv(cv(s1), nat1)), wbr(cv(s1), cfv(cphtpc, cv(s0)), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), csn(cfv(cv(s1), nat0))))))))
comment: Define the class of simply connected topologies. A topology is simply connected if it is path-connected and every loop (continuous path with identical start and endpoint) is contractible to a point (path-homotopic to a constant function). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
